rooms.description: Minimalist entry area with open space and natural light; adheres to Vastu by placing entrance facing east.
Spacious living area with functional furniture arrangement in line with minimalist design. Windows positioned on the south wall for natural lighting.
Open dining space adjacent to living room; designed to encourage social interaction and proper circulation of energy as per Vastu guidelines.
Compact kitchen with modern appliances and integrated storage. Placed on the south-east corner for auspiciousity.
Large bedroom offering privacy with east-facing windows to invite positive energy.
Functional guest room designed following minimalist principles and Vastu principles of balance and comfort.
Dedicated quiet space for reading, furnished with minimalistic shelves and comfortable seating; placed in a quiet corner away from main traffic areas.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned to bring positive energy as per Vastu.
Optimized for natural light and cross ventilation, maintaining minimalist design aesthetics.
Ventilated openings ensuring proper airflow as required by local building norms.
